location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter no.2609 of 1854 from Henry Anderson, Secretary to the Government of Bombay, to Captain Arnold Kemball, Resident in the Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: The letter is an acknowledgement of receipt of Kemball’s earlier letter (folio 360) relating to two slave boys from Muscat who stowed themselves aboard the Honourable Company’s steam frigate Ajdaha. Anderson writes that the Government approves of Kemball’s proceedings.
